summary: A dramatization of Gloria Steinem's undercover investigation of the working conditions Bunnies faced at the Playboy Clubs.
cast: Kirstie Alley|Cotter Smith|Deborah Van Valkenburgh|Joanna Kerns|Lisa Pelikan|Delta Burke|Mary Woronov|Diana Scarwid|Romy Windsor|Randi Brooks|DeeDee Rescher|Chick Vennera|Stanley Kamel|James T. Callahan|Katie Budge|Madison Mason|Lela Rochon|Chanelle Lee|Chuck Wassil|Randy Hamilton|Richard Lefevre|Keith Mills|Teddy Wilson|Kenny Long|Thomas Bellin|Philip English|Tamera Baumberger|Precious Powell|Lisa Marie Gurley|Jamie Taylor|Susan Healis|Sharon Woods-Taylor|Shelley Johnson|Patricia Ayame Thomson|Ginger Miller|Victoria Wilburn|Lou Felder|Julie Simone
title: Una chica de club
